summary: Full e2e testing of Charm Thai Restaurant website. All backend API tests pass (5/5). Frontend pages load correctly with proper design. Contact form submission works. Video modal opens. Gallery lightbox works. Mobile sticky bar present.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML hydration warning: <span> cannot be child of <select>/<option>. This is a React hydration error in the party size select field. Console logs show 'In HTML, <span> cannot be a child of <select>'.
Video from Wix CDN shows loading spinner (not playing) - expected behavior per spec since Wix may block external hotlinking

issues: Mobile sticky bar shows CALL and ORDER buttons - ORDER button may be cut off by Emergent badge overlay in preview

action_items: Fix React hydration warning: <span> inside <select>/<option> in PrivateDiningPage party size dropdown - remove any span wrapper inside option elements
critical_code_review_comments: PrivateDiningPage: select dropdown with option elements appears to have span children causing React hydration warning - check the partySize select rendering
server.py is clean and well-structured - all _id fields excluded from MongoDB responses

success_rate.frontend: 95% - all pages load, forms work, navigation works, minor hydration warning

seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed enquiries via API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features work. Backend /api/enquiry POST and GET work. Contact and Private Dining forms submit successfully. Menu tabs functional (11 tabs). What's On video modal opens with HTML5 player. Gallery lightbox works. Mobile sticky bar with CALL/ORDER present. Minor issue: React hydration warning in PrivateDiningPage select dropdown.
passed_tests: Home page loads with hero image, ORDER NOW and BOOK A TABLE CTAs
All nav links work (Home, Menu, Private Dining, What's On, Gallery, Contact)
Menu page tabs: Starters, Noodles, Fried Rice, Stir Fry, Curry, Fish, Vegetarian, Soup, Chef's Special, Kids Menu, Extras & Drinks
Contact form submits to /api/enquiry with success message
What's On 3 video cards load with CLICK TO PLAY
Video modal opens with HTML5 player
Gallery loads with filter buttons (All, Food, Interior, Team) and lightbox
Mobile sticky bar with CALL and ORDER buttons
Backend validation - 422 for missing required fields
